text: Podhojni Hrib () is a settlement immediately north of Rob in the Municipality of Velike Lašče in central Slovenia. The entire municipality is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Velike Lašče municipal site ==References== ==External links== * *Podhojni Hrib on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Podhojni Hrib
